Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create role and artifact, make the role responsible for the artifact
2. DnD the role to the Team Allocation of a CP or DP
--> An error has occurred. IUPL0116E.
  java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.ui.UserInteractionHelper.selectWorkProducts(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.process.command.OBSDropCommand.preExecute(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.process.command.BSDropCommand$1.run(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.ui.UserInteractionHelper$11.run(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)


More information:
1. This is a regression. Epf1.1 no this problem.
Fixed. PlatformUI.getWorkbench().getActiveWorkbenchWindow().getShell() returned "null" workbench window when called from non-ui thread. In 3.2.1 it seemed to work fine, but in Eclispe3.2.2 it doesnt.

Fix is verified on Epf1.2, 20070321-1625-M1.
Thanks.
